name: Font-Family Role Assignments
description: Each font family has a designated role in the design system. Using the wrong font family for a context breaks the typographic hierarchy.

--ks-font-family-display.role: Display and headline typography — hero text, page titles, large-format headings
--ks-font-family-display.rationale: Display font is optimized for large sizes with tight line-height; not suited for body text or small UI elements

--ks-font-family-copy.role: Body copy and reading text — paragraphs, descriptions, long-form content
--ks-font-family-copy.rationale: Copy font is optimized for readability at body sizes with comfortable line-height

--ks-font-family-interface.role: UI controls and interface elements — form inputs, buttons, navigation, labels
--ks-font-family-interface.rationale: Interface font is designed for UI controls — compact, clear at small sizes

--ks-font-family-mono.role: Monospace text — code blocks, technical values, data display
--ks-font-family-mono.rationale: Mono font is for code and technical content only
